entry.source: The demon that lives below Ikebukuro,{F801}{F804,5}Tlazolteotl,{F804,0} has a lot of corn, or so I've{F801}heard. If you can defeat this demon, we can{F801}get our hands on some food! But I need to{F801}tell you how to get into Ikebukuro first.{F801}I'm {F804,5}across from the item shop under Shinjuku.{F804,0}{F801}
